docs.text: This is XIPA API documentation With love only for Zhenyok The base URL is: https://api.xipa.ru How to use POST or GET or PUT or DELETE requests Use HTTP method for CRUD metolodogy. If you`re creating something, use POST . If you`re reading (getting) something, use GET If you`re updating something, use PUT If you`re deleting something, use DELETE Rate limits First you need to know that the server is rate limited. It means that every HTTP client can send limited requests per time unit. You can see rate limit info in response headers Header name Description X-RateLimit-Limit Amount of total requests that you can send X-RateLimit-Remaining Amount of requests that you can send Retry-After Timestamp when you can retry Validation Do data validation in client before send it to API If client sends invalid data server will return a string with validation errors. Each one starts with new line
docs.title: Home

docs.text: With love only for Zhenyok
docs.title: This is XIPA API documentation

docs.text: https://api.xipa.ru
docs.title: The base URL is:

docs.text: Use HTTP method for CRUD metolodogy. If you`re creating something, use POST . If you`re reading (getting) something, use GET If you`re updating something, use PUT If you`re deleting something, use DELETE
docs.title: POST or GET or PUT or DELETE requests

docs.text: First you need to know that the server is rate limited. It means that every HTTP client can send limited requests per time unit. You can see rate limit info in response headers Header name Description X-RateLimit-Limit Amount of total requests that you can send X-RateLimit-Remaining Amount of requests that you can send Retry-After Timestamp when you can retry
docs.title: Rate limits

docs.text: Do data validation in client before send it to API If client sends invalid data server will return a string with validation errors. Each one starts with new line
docs.title: Validation

docs.text: Cities You can get all cities by sending: GET /json/cities.json You have to set city as it`s index of cities.json array (ex 0 for Москва). For example, to set user`s city, send city parameter as integer (it`s index of cities.json array)
docs.title: Cities

docs.text: You can get all cities by sending: GET /json/cities.json You have to set city as it`s index of cities.json array (ex 0 for Москва). For example, to set user`s city, send city parameter as integer (it`s index of cities.json array)
docs.title: Cities

docs.text: File downloads To download a file (ex. user`s avatar or passport photos) you need a file name, that may be in, for example, user`s profile JSON. Use the base download link: https://dl.xipa.ru/ and append file name to this
docs.title: Downloads

docs.text: To download a file (ex. user`s avatar or passport photos) you need a file name, that may be in, for example, user`s profile JSON. Use the base download link: https://dl.xipa.ru/ and append file name to this
docs.title: File downloads

docs.text: Create an order Only users with role "customer" can make orders. To create order, send POST /order with parameters Field Description Required Type name Order name true String description Order description true String completeDate Timestamp (only future) true String or integer tasks[] Array of below (objects) true Array of objects tasks[].categoryID Category ID like "602bfe6cf8d293fbec82f93e" true MongoDB ObjectId tasks[].ids[] Array of indexes of tasks array of a category true Array of ints tasks[].needMaterial Is it needed materials to do the tasks true Boolean tasks[].isHeavyTask Is the task heavy true Boolean address Order address true String phone Customer`s phone true String isEmergency Is task urgent true Boolean accessToken User`s accessToken true String Request example { "name": "Настроить принте", "description": "Шла Саша по шоссе и сосала сушку", "completeDate": "2021-02-16T22:54:18+03:00", "tasks": [{ "categoryID": "602bfe6cf8d293fbec82f93e", "ids": [0,1], "needMaterial": false, "isHeavyTask": false }], "address": "Россия, Москва, ул. Сивицкого, д. 13", "phone": "+79999999999", "isEmergency": false, "accessToken": "c31d3cecf61f412c24160b9aa304b7af8128ad9495b828db1f1509dced31508f" } Response 201 JSON with orderID like { "orderID": "602c25b3ff4c52b2198b07b8" } Limits 3 requests per 15 minutes
docs.title: Create an order

docs.text: Only users with role "customer" can make orders. To create order, send POST /order with parameters Field Description Required Type name Order name true String description Order description true String completeDate Timestamp (only future) true String or integer tasks[] Array of below (objects) true Array of objects tasks[].categoryID Category ID like "602bfe6cf8d293fbec82f93e" true MongoDB ObjectId tasks[].ids[] Array of indexes of tasks array of a category true Array of ints tasks[].needMaterial Is it needed materials to do the tasks true Boolean tasks[].isHeavyTask Is the task heavy true Boolean address Order address true String phone Customer`s phone true String isEmergency Is task urgent true Boolean accessToken User`s accessToken true String
docs.title: Create an order

docs.text: { "name": "Настроить принте", "description": "Шла Саша по шоссе и сосала сушку", "completeDate": "2021-02-16T22:54:18+03:00", "tasks": [{ "categoryID": "602bfe6cf8d293fbec82f93e", "ids": [0,1], "needMaterial": false, "isHeavyTask": false }], "address": "Россия, Москва, ул. Сивицкого, д. 13", "phone": "+79999999999", "isEmergency": false, "accessToken": "c31d3cecf61f412c24160b9aa304b7af8128ad9495b828db1f1509dced31508f" }
docs.title: Request example

docs.text: 201 JSON with orderID like { "orderID": "602c25b3ff4c52b2198b07b8" }
docs.title: Response

docs.text: 3 requests per 15 minutes
docs.title: Limits

docs.text: List orders To see all XIPA orders, don`t send accessToken. To see only orders created or performed by user, send accessToken. Request GET /orders Filters (GET parameters): Field Description Required limit 1-20 false offset Offset DB query false searchQuery Query for search by categories or tasks name false Response 200 { "orders": [ { "_id": "602c25b3ff4c52b2198b07b8", "name": "Настроить принте", "description": "Шла Саша по шоссе и сосала сушку", "completeDate": "2021-02-16T19:54:18.000Z", "address": "Россия, Москва, ул. Сивицкого, д. 13", "isEmergency": false, "phone": "+79999999999", "creator": { "_id": "6019437886c50e3b0f46e6ad", "firstName": "Алексей" }, "performer": null, "createdAt": "2021-02-16T20:06:11.572Z" } ], "totalItems": 1, "takenTime": 109 } Where: Field Description orders Query result totalItems Total amount of items by your query takenTime Time in ms (0.001 sec) taken for this request Limits 1 request per second
docs.title: List orders

docs.text: To see all XIPA orders, don`t send accessToken. To see only orders created or performed by user, send accessToken.
docs.title: List orders

docs.text: GET /orders Filters (GET parameters): Field Description Required limit 1-20 false offset Offset DB query false searchQuery Query for search by categories or tasks name false
docs.title: Request

docs.text: 200 { "orders": [ { "_id": "602c25b3ff4c52b2198b07b8", "name": "Настроить принте", "description": "Шла Саша по шоссе и сосала сушку", "completeDate": "2021-02-16T19:54:18.000Z", "address": "Россия, Москва, ул. Сивицкого, д. 13", "isEmergency": false, "phone": "+79999999999", "creator": { "_id": "6019437886c50e3b0f46e6ad", "firstName": "Алексей" }, "performer": null, "createdAt": "2021-02-16T20:06:11.572Z" } ], "totalItems": 1, "takenTime": 109 } Where: Field Description orders Query result totalItems Total amount of items by your query takenTime Time in ms (0.001 sec) taken for this request
docs.title: Response

docs.text: 1 request per second
docs.title: Limits

docs.text: Get categories GET /tasks/categories Filters (GET parameters): Field Description Required limit 1-20 false offset Offset DB query false searchQuery Query for search by categories or tasks name false Note that no autorization required for this method Response { "tasksCategories": [ { "_id": "602bfe6cf8d293fbec82f93e", "name": "Мобильная разработка", "tasks": [ { "name": "iOS-разработка" }, { "name": "Android разработка" }, { "name": "Дизайн" } ] }, { "_id": "602bfe90f8d293fbec82f948", "name": "Веб-разработка", "tasks": [ { "name": "FrontEnd" }, { "name": "BackEnd" }, { "name": "UX/UI" } ] } ], "totalItems": 2, "takenTime": 5 } Where: Field Description tasksCategories Query result totalItems Total amount of items by your query takenTime Time in ms (0.001 sec) taken for this request Rate limit 10 queries per second (send requests as rarely as possible)
docs.title: Get categories

docs.text: GET /tasks/categories Filters (GET parameters): Field Description Required limit 1-20 false offset Offset DB query false searchQuery Query for search by categories or tasks name false Note that no autorization required for this method
docs.title: Get categories

docs.text: { "tasksCategories": [ { "_id": "602bfe6cf8d293fbec82f93e", "name": "Мобильная разработка", "tasks": [ { "name": "iOS-разработка" }, { "name": "Android разработка" }, { "name": "Дизайн" } ] }, { "_id": "602bfe90f8d293fbec82f948", "name": "Веб-разработка", "tasks": [ { "name": "FrontEnd" }, { "name": "BackEnd" }, { "name": "UX/UI" } ] } ], "totalItems": 2, "takenTime": 5 } Where: Field Description tasksCategories Query result totalItems Total amount of items by your query takenTime Time in ms (0.001 sec) taken for this request
docs.title: Response

docs.text: 10 queries per second (send requests as rarely as possible)
docs.title: Rate limit

docs.text: Authorization Each sensitive request has to contain accessToken parameter. If it`s need to get accessToken for a user, you need: Required data field descrption username User`s username password User`s password URL GET /accessToken Response You will receive json with accessToken field { "accessToken": "c898404658d3ec32800a6d706ed7d23215bc93abb00ab8d828ef5d87ec513bf9" } Limits 3 requests per 15 minutes
docs.title: Authorization (getting token)

docs.text: Each sensitive request has to contain accessToken parameter. If it`s need to get accessToken for a user, you need:
docs.title: Authorization

docs.text: field descrption username User`s username password User`s password
docs.title: Required data

docs.text: GET /accessToken
docs.title: URL

docs.text: You will receive json with accessToken field { "accessToken": "c898404658d3ec32800a6d706ed7d23215bc93abb00ab8d828ef5d87ec513bf9" }
docs.title: Response

docs.text: 3 requests per 15 minutes
docs.title: Limits

docs.text: Edit user`s data Required data Field Descrption accessToken User`s access token and any data you need to edit URL PUT /editUserInfo Response 201 You also will receive JSON with accessToken, if user`s password was changed. Otherwise, you will receive blank JSON ({}) Limits 3 requests per second
docs.title: Edit profile info

docs.text: Field Descrption accessToken User`s access token and any data you need to edit
docs.title: Required data

docs.text: PUT /editUserInfo
docs.title: URL

docs.text: 201 You also will receive JSON with accessToken, if user`s password was changed. Otherwise, you will receive blank JSON ({})
docs.title: Response

docs.text: 3 requests per second
docs.title: Limits

docs.text: Getting account info You can get account info by it`s accessToken. Required data Field Descrption accessToken User`s access token URL GET /me Response For performers: { "_id": "6013e2839a4995a85411c20c", "firstName": "Алексей", "middleName": "Михайлович", "lastName": "Хордов", "inn": "999999999999", "personalID": "0713 827356", "balance": 3000, "city": "ru:moscow", "email": "wejoigjoiew@mail.ru", "passportFiles": [ "upload_3d68c5b44c024776096e6389b83f0e4c.jpg", "upload_3c5889afe5a51590176b859598aacd56.png" ], "createdAt": "2021-01-29T10:25:07.607Z", "role": "performer", "verifyStatus": 0, "lastVisitAt": "2021-02-02T12:10:26.184Z" } For customers (no anketa filled): { "_id": "6019437886c50e3b0f46e6ad", "firstName": "Алексей", "email": "wejoigjoiefw@mail.ru", "username": "wejoigjoiefw", "balance": 3000, "createdAt": "2021-02-02T12:20:08.542Z", "role": "customer", "verifyStatus": 0, "lastVisitAt": "2021-02-02T12:21:57.322Z", } For customers (anketa filled): { "_id": "6019437886c50e3b0f46e6ad", "firstName": "Алексей", "email": "wejoigjoiefw@mail.ru", "balance": 3000, "createdAt": "2021-02-02T12:20:08.542Z", "role": "customer", "verifyStatus": 0, "lastVisitAt": "2021-02-02T12:21:57.322Z", "legalName": "ИП Алексеев Алексей Алексеевич", "inn": "999999999999", "ogrn": "9999999999999", "bik": "999999999", "bankName": "Sivitskiy`s Bank", "bankAccount": "99999999999999999999", "lawAddress": "Россия, Тверская область, г. Тверь, ул. Вокзальная д. 1", "zipAddress": "Россия, Тверская область, г. Тверь, ул. Вокзальная д. 1", "legalFIO": "Мазафаков Михаил Игоревич", "legalPosition": "Генеральный директор", "legalPurpose": "цлупзщукплузщлпщзуклцпр" } Limits 3 requests per second

docs.text: Joining users There are POST request which allows everyone to subscribe XIPA news over E-Mail. If request is success, the letter will be dropped to info@xipa.ru Required data field description required firstName User`s firstname true email User`s email true comment Comment. Min 8 symbols false URL POST /join Response You will receive HTTP status code 201 Limits 3 requests per hour
docs.title: Sign up for project news

docs.text: There are POST request which allows everyone to subscribe XIPA news over E-Mail. If request is success, the letter will be dropped to info@xipa.ru
docs.title: Joining users

docs.text: field description required firstName User`s firstname true email User`s email true comment Comment. Min 8 symbols false
docs.title: Required data

docs.text: POST /join
docs.title: URL

docs.text: You will receive HTTP status code 201
docs.title: Response

docs.text: 3 requests per hour
docs.title: Limits

docs.text: Password reset To reset an account password, it`s needed to send request (near below) and receive resetion code over user`s E-Mail. Then you need send second request (far below) Getting the code Required data Field Descrption email User`s email URL POST /resetPassword Response 201 { "accessToken": "rkegorhhr..." } Send resetion request Required data field descrption email User`s email code Password resetion code password New password URL PUT /resetPassword Response 201 Limits 5 requests per 30 minutes
docs.title: Password reset

docs.text: To reset an account password, it`s needed to send request (near below) and receive resetion code over user`s E-Mail. Then you need send second request (far below)
docs.title: Password reset

docs.text: Field Descrption email User`s email
docs.title: Required data

docs.text: POST /resetPassword
docs.title: URL

docs.text: 201 { "accessToken": "rkegorhhr..." }
docs.title: Response

docs.text: field descrption email User`s email code Password resetion code password New password
docs.title: Required data

docs.text: PUT /resetPassword
docs.title: URL

docs.text: 5 requests per 30 minutes
docs.title: Limits

docs.text: Filling the customer`s anketa Send PUT request with required data. You can update anketa info at any time Required data Field Description Required legalName Полное имя юридического лица true inn ИНН true ogrn ОГРН (либо ОГРНИП, если ИПшник) true kpp КПП (у ИПшников его нет) false bik БИК true bankName Имя банка true bankAccount Номер расчётного счёта true bankKorrAccount Банковский корр. счёт true lawAddress Юридический адрес true zipAddress Почтовый адрес true legalFIO ФИО ответственного лица true legalPosition Должность ответственного лица true legalPurpose Основание ответственного лица true accessToken User`s access token true URL PUT /users/customer/anketa Response You will receive HTTP status code 201 Limits 10 requests per hour
docs.title: Filling user`s anketa

docs.text: Send PUT request with required data. You can update anketa info at any time
docs.title: Filling the customer`s anketa

docs.text: Field Description Required legalName Полное имя юридического лица true inn ИНН true ogrn ОГРН (либо ОГРНИП, если ИПшник) true kpp КПП (у ИПшников его нет) false bik БИК true bankName Имя банка true bankAccount Номер расчётного счёта true bankKorrAccount Банковский корр. счёт true lawAddress Юридический адрес true zipAddress Почтовый адрес true legalFIO ФИО ответственного лица true legalPosition Должность ответственного лица true legalPurpose Основание ответственного лица true accessToken User`s access token true

docs.title: URL

docs.text: You will receive HTTP status code 201
docs.title: Response

docs.text: 10 requests per hour

docs.text: Register a customer Required data field description firstName User`s first name email User`s E-Mail URL POST /users/customer Response You will receive JSON with user`s accessToken { "accessToken": "c898404658d3ec32800a6d706ed7d23215bc93abb00ab8d828ef5d87ec513bf9" } Limits 3 requests per hour

docs.text: Register a performer Required data Field Description Required firstName User`s first name true middleName User`s middle name true lastName User`s last name true personalID Паспорт. Серия и номер. Пример "0123 456789" true email User`s email true inn ИНН true city See at cities page true passport1 FILE (passport main page) true passport2 FILE (passport propiska page) true URL POST /users/performer Response You will receive JSON with user`s accessToken. { "accessToken": "c898404658d3ec32800a6d706ed7d23215bc93abb00ab8d828ef5d87ec513bf9" } Limits 1 request per second
